name: BackSpaceInvaders
description:
Game created for Murcia Game Jam 2022

Theme: fire

In this game you have to fire

Not moving, only fire

You are the invaders and you have to kill the players who want to defend his planet

Instructions are in the game

You also can play against a friend using the same keyboard

Enjoy!
